inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: fracture caused by low energy trauma

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: patient can understand the procedure and participate in follow-up program

exclusion.criterion: previous hip or pelvic fractures on the same side
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: concurrent oral treatment with corticosteroids, and/or osteoporosis medication
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of corticosteroids or osteoporosis medication

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of dialysis or elevated creatinine

notes: Patient has Paget's disease of bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. Sister had similar problems diagnosed at age 52.
